item.name: Count prepared distributed transactions awaiting recovery
Count file in backup mode
item.description: Count the file is currently in backup mode. -- ALTER DATABASE BEGIN BACKUP;

item.name: Buffer Cache Hit Ratio
item.description: Buffer Cache Hit Ratio % (LogRead - PhyRead)/LogRead

item.name: Oracle connect
item.description: check connect from zabora

item.name: Oracle connect
item.description: abs check from zabbix cards check from 192.168.103.26

item.name: Cursor Cache Hit Ratio
item.description: Cursor Cache Hit Ratio % CursorCacheHit/SoftParse

item.name: DB CPU: CPU time spent on database user-level calls
Size of user data (without temp).
item.description: Space used (exclude SYS,SYSTEM,TEMP,UNDO)

item.name: DB Time: Time performing Database user-level calls
Database Block Changes per second
item.description: Closely related to "consistent changes", this statistic counts the total number of changes that were part of an update or delete operation that were made to all blocks in the SGA. Such changes generate redo log entries and hence become permanent changes to the database if the transaction is committed. This approximates total database work. It statistic indicates the rate at which buffers are being dirtied (on a per-transaction or per-second basis, for example).

item.name: bytes/sec received via SQL*Net from dblink
item.description: bytes received via SQL*Net from dblink - Total number of bytes received from a database link over Oracle Net Services

item.name: SQL*Net roundtrips to/from dblink (per sec)
item.description: SQL*Net roundtrips to/from dblink - Total number of Net8 messages sent over and received from a database link

item.name: bytes/sec sent via SQL*Net to dblink
item.description: bytes sent via SQL*Net to dblink - Total number of bytes sent over a database link

item.name: Count of data files not backuped last 3 days
Disk space used by flash recovery area files
Count of sessions waited dblink more 3600 secs
Elapsed time spent running the Java VM
Log file switches
item.description: for monitoring log switch frequency

item.name: Library Cache Hit Ratio
item.description: Library Cache Hit Ratio % Hits/Pins

item.name: Logical reads.
item.description: The sum of "db block gets" plus "consistent gets". This includes logical reads of database blocks from either the buffer cache or process private memory.

item.name: Log file switch completion waits.
item.description: The log file switch completion Oracle metric occurs when it is waiting for a log switch to complete.

item.name: Count of dbspaces with available space less than 10%.
bytes received via SQL*Net from client
bytes sent via SQL*Net to client
PGA Cache Hit
item.description: PGA Cache Hit % % Bytes/TotalBytes

item.name: Physical reads.
item.description: Total number of data blocks read from disk. This value can be greater than the value of "physical reads direct" plus "physical reads cache" as reads into process private buffers also included in this statistic.

item.name: physical reads direct
item.description: Number of reads directly from disk, bypassing the buffer cache. For example, in high bandwidth, data-intensive operations such as parallel query, reads of disk blocks bypass the buffer cache to maximize transfer rates and to prevent the premature aging of shared data blocks resident in the buffer cache.

item.name: Elapsed time spent running the PL/SQL interpreter
Users with proxy to DBA user
Oracle PSU installed
item.description: Latest installed PSU from registry$history

item.name: Oracle PSU installed (12)
item.description: Latest installed PSU from DBA_REGISTRY_SQLPATCH

item.name: Row Cache Hit Ratio
item.description: Row Cache Hit Ratio % Hits/Gets

item.name: SGA: shared pool memory free percent
Elapsed time SQL statements are executing
